targets.query: SELECT max("RH")  / 10 FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("RH" > -1) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("RH") *-0.05 FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("RH" = '-1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("S")*0  FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("S" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("O")*-0.2  FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("O" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("Y")*-0.3  FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("Y" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("M")*-0.1  FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("M" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("VV") +1)*100 FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("VV" < 51) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("VV") -50)*1000  FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("VV" > 50) AND ("VV" < 80) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT ((mean("VV")-80)*5+35)*1000  FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("VV" > 79) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("M")-1  FROM /^$Stations$/ WHERE ("M" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
